_header: The false fox came unto our croft
_description: The false fox — eighteen couplets each with refrain, ‘With how fox how with hey fox hey / Come no more unto our house to bere our geese aweye’

CULEe112.First Lines:
The fals fox came vnto oure croftAnd so oure gese ful fast he
                    sought…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …I pray the fox seid the goose thoo…
